channel.title: Epicurus [18 months+ uptime, reliable]
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://epicurus-rsps.net/images/logo.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.epicurus-rsps.net/images/forums.jpg[/img][url=http://www.epicurus-rsps.net/forum/] Official Forums[/url] [IMG]http://www.epicurus-rsps.net/images/playnow.png[/img][url=http://www.epicurus-rsps.net/playnow.html] Play Now[/url] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LofdU.png[/img][url=http://www.epicurus-rsps.net/forum/showthread.php?tid=791] Download Epicurus Launcher[/url]
[b]About us:[/b] Epicurus has been open since March of 2011, almost about 2 years as of now, and we have never failed to deliver. We spend money every month on the best possible technology to keep you, the player, satisfied with us. We have powerful servers with great DDoS protection, to ensure that you are always able to get on and play, no matter what time of the day it is.
[b]Our worlds:[/b] Epicurus runs three worlds on login. They are actual worlds, and not just worlds you use commands to get to. The first world is an economic world where skillers and hardcore players get together, the second world is a player killing world, where items come easy, but respect and fame comes hard, and finally, the third world is a spawn server, but not your average spawn server. Check out the sticky in our Announcements to read up about it.
[b]Our Features:[/b] - [b]Epicurus Spawn added! A new, third world! Check the Announcements forum for more information![/b] [img]http://www.isi.edu/~lhuang/new_icon.gif[/img] - Full and flawless dicing and gambling! - Full and flawless staking at the Duel Arena! - Full and flawless Bank PIN system to keep your items safe! - First ever fully operational Grand Exchange system! - First ever fully flawless operational Drop Party Room! - Proper combat, hybriding suppot with F-Keys! - New and updated items always being added such as handcannons, and chaotic staffs! - Lottery, win big or go home! - Perfected name changing system! - Perfected donator crown changing, with tons of options! - Loyalty titles, pre-set and custom titles! - Custom stores such as PvP Stores, Slayer Stores, and Donor Stores! - Generous PvP drop tables ranging from artifacts to chaotic items! - Proper curse prayers! - Tutorial on login to easily orient yourself! - Proper clue scrolls and full puzzle boxes! - Proper item effects such as Spirit Shields, including all special attacks! - Proper banking with new banking features such as live searching and a money bag! - Great and stable economy, promising an enjoyable playing experience! - Perfectly accurate leaderboards so you can always track your progress to fame! - Great PvP and PvM on both of our worlds with tons of challenges! - Great community with a full website and forums to ensure you're never alone! - and many other smaller features that we cannot even fit on this page!
[b]Some of our features in action![/b]
[img]http://www.epicurus-rsps.net/newad/fixeddicing.gif[/img][img]http://www.epicurus-rsps.net/newad/grandexchange.gif[/img] [img]http://www.epicurus-rsps.net/newad/partyroom.gif[/img][img]http://www.epicurus-rsps.net/newad/bankpins.gif[/img]
[b]Our dedicated server's sheer power:[/b]
[img]http://www.epicurus-rsps.net/newad/speedtest.png[/img] [img]http://www.epicurus-rsps.net/newad/dedispecs.png[/img]
[/center]

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:9, topic:445188”]Would be nice to see the grand exchange improved so you don’t have to look through listings as if it is kreigs list. (judging by the pictures). Very nice, I don’t play rsps that much anymore, but it looks wonderful.

How fast is training?[/quote]
It’s a good server, the forums are wore than the massive signatures on R-S, but the server is decent enough.
I think training is average speed, a few days to get max if I remember right

item.title: Epicurus [18 months+ uptime, reliable]
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

[center]

Official Forums
Play Now
Download Epicurus Launcher

About us:
Epicurus has been open since March of 2011, almost about 2 years as of now, and we have never failed to deliver. We spend money every month on the best possible technology to keep you, the player, satisfied with us. We have powerful servers with great DDoS protection, to ensure that you are always able to get on and play, no matter what time of the day it is.

Our worlds:
Epicurus runs three worlds on login. They are actual worlds, and not just worlds you use commands to get to. The first world is an economic world where skillers and hardcore players get together, the second world is a player killing world, where items come easy, but respect and fame comes hard, and finally, the third world is a spawn server, but not your average spawn server. Check out the sticky in our Announcements to read up about it.

Our Features:

  • Epicurus Spawn added! A new, third world! Check the Announcements forum for more information!
  • Full and flawless dicing and gambling!
  • Full and flawless staking at the Duel Arena!
  • Full and flawless Bank PIN system to keep your items safe!
  • First ever fully operational Grand Exchange system!
  • First ever fully flawless operational Drop Party Room!
  • Proper combat, hybriding suppot with F-Keys!
  • New and updated items always being added such as handcannons, and chaotic staffs!
  • Lottery, win big or go home!
  • Perfected name changing system!
  • Perfected donator crown changing, with tons of options!
  • Loyalty titles, pre-set and custom titles!
  • Custom stores such as PvP Stores, Slayer Stores, and Donor Stores!
  • Generous PvP drop tables ranging from artifacts to chaotic items!
  • Proper curse prayers!
  • Tutorial on login to easily orient yourself!
  • Proper clue scrolls and full puzzle boxes!
  • Proper item effects such as Spirit Shields, including all special attacks!
  • Proper banking with new banking features such as live searching and a money bag!
  • Great and stable economy, promising an enjoyable playing experience!
  • Perfectly accurate leaderboards so you can always track your progress to fame!
  • Great PvP and PvM on both of our worlds with tons of challenges!
  • Great community with a full website and forums to ensure you’re never alone!
  • and many other smaller features that we cannot even fit on this page!

Some of our features in action!


Our dedicated server’s sheer power:


[/center]

Read full topic
